contents.text: Welcome to BitBucket in San Francisco, your hub for collaborating on code, managing Git repositories, and building software as a team.
For repository management and code collaboration support, press 1.
For help with pull requests and inline code comments, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a code collaboration specialist.

navigationGoals: Get detailed feedback on my open pull request and resolve inline comments quickly
As a veteran new to code collaboration, I’m trying to view and address inline comments on my pull request.
I need help resolving merge conflicts in my pull request and adding inline code review comments on my API changes.
I need help understanding how to add comments to a pull request in my repository.
I’d like help reviewing and leaving inline comments on a pull request for my physics simulation code.

contents.text: For assistance with repository creation, permissions, and branches, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a repository configuration expert.

navigationGoals: Set up a new repository for my project, configure branch protections, and grant team access
As a former service member building my first project, I need to set up a new repository with branch protections and user permissions.
I want to create a new Git repository for my microservice, set up branch protection rules, and assign write permissions to my dev team.
I want guidance on creating a new repository and setting permissions for my team.
I’d like to create a new repository with branches and grant access to my study group for our quantum mechanics project.

contents.text: For account, billing, and security settings, press 2.
For billing inquiries and subscription plans, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing support team.

navigationGoals: Review my current subscription charges and upgrade to the premium plan before the next billing cycle
I’m a recent veteran user and need help understanding my team’s subscription billing and plan upgrade options.
I’d like to upgrade to the Standard subscription plan, update my payment method, and understand our seat-based billing costs.
I have a question about my subscription charges and billing plan.
I need to review my subscription options and billing details for our student team plan.

contents.text: For account security, user access, and profile settings, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account security support.

navigationGoals: Enable two-factor authentication on my account and audit user access permissions for my team
As an ex-military professional securing my tools, I want to enable two-factor authentication and manage team access.
I need to enable SAML single-sign-on for my organization and configure two-factor authentication for user accounts.
I need assistance updating my account security settings and managing user access.
I need to enable two-factor authentication and adjust user access settings for my BitBucket account.
